resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104526</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104526</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205782</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lyrical Legacy: 400 Years of American Song and Poetry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lyrical Legacy: 400 Jahre amerikanisches 
Lied und Poesie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Legs Lyrique : 400 ans de chanson et de 
poésie américaines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Legacy Lyrical: 400 anos da canção e da 
poesia americanas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eredità Lyrical: 400 anni della canzone e 
della poesia americane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λυρική κληρονομιά: 400 Έτη αμερικανικών 
τραγουδιού και ποίησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Herencia Lírica: 400 años de canción y de
poesía americanas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines 18 historical American songs and poems. Organized by time periods and considered from historical perspectives, songs and poems include Bonny Barbara Allan, Yankee Doodle, John Brown's Body/The Battle Hymn of the Republic, You're a Grand Old Flag, We Shall Overcome, and others. Sound recordings and original documents are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft 18 historische amerikanische Liede und
Gedichte. Organisiert bis zum Zeitabschnitten und von den 
historischen Perspektiven betrachtet, enthalten Liede und Gedichte 
Bonny Barbara Allan, Yankee Gekritzel, John braune Body/The 
Schlacht-Hymne der Republik, Sie sind eine großartige alte 
Markierungsfahne, überwinden wir und andere. Tonaufnahmen und 
Originalurkunden werden zur Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine 18 chansons et poésies américaines 
historiques. Organisé par des périodes de temps et considéré
des perspectives historiques, les chansons et les poésies incluent 
Gentille Barbara Allan, griffonnage de Yankee, hymne brune de 
bataille de John Body/The de la République, vous sont un vieil 
indicateur grand, nous surmonterons, et d'autres. Des 
enregistrements sonores et les documents initiaux sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina 18 canções e poemas americanos 
históricos. Organizado por períodos de tempo e considerado dos
perspectives históricos, as canções e os poemas incluem Barbara 
bonny Allan, doodle de Yankee, hymn marrom da república, você da 
batalha de John Body/The são uma bandeira velha grande, nós 
superaremos, e outros. As gravações sadias e os originais 
originais são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina 18 canzoni e poems americani storici. 
Organizzato entro i periodi di tempo e considerato dalle 
prospettive storiche, le canzoni ed i poems includono Barbara bonny 
Allan, il doodle di Yankee, il hymn marrone della Repubblica, voi di 
battaglia del John Body/The sono una grande vecchia bandierina, 
sormonteremo ed altri. Le registrazioni del suono ed i documenti
originali sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει 18 ιστορικά αμερικανικά τραγούδια και 
ποιήματα. Οργανωμένα μέχρι τα χρονικά διαστήματα και 
εξεταζόμενα από τις ιστορικές προοπτικές, τα τραγούδια και τα 
ποιήματα περιλαμβάνουν την ωραία Barbara Allan, Αμερικανός 
Doodle, σώμα John Brown's/o ύμνος μάχης της Δημοκρατίας, 
είστε μια μεγάλη παλαιά σημαία, θα υπερνικήσουμε, και άλλα. 
Οι υγιείς καταγραφές και τα αρχικά έγγραφα παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina 18 canciones y poemas americanos 
históricos. Ordenado por períodos y considerado de 
perspectivas históricas, las canciones y los poemas incluyen a 
Barbara bonny Allan, doodle de Yankee, himno marrón de la república,
usted de la batalla de Juan Body/The son un viejo indicador 
magnífico, superaremos, y otros. Se proporcionan las 
grabaciones de sonidos y los documentos originales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205782</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104526</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/lyrical-legacy-400-years-of-american-song-and-poetry</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
